description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY SIDE EXTENSION, ERECTION OF  HIP TO GABLE ROOF, ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION, INSTALLATION OF X1 SIDE (NORTHWEST) WINDOW AND INSTALLATION OF X3 ROOFLIGHTS ON THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising erection of a single storey side extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising a hip to gable roof conversion, erection of a rear roof dormer and installation of 1x window on the eastern elevation would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of 2x rooflights on the front roofslope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.

Condition : 5 - Any side windows must be obscure glazed and non opening 1.7m above the floor of the rooms in which the window is installed in order to comply with Condition B.2 (c) Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning Order 2015 (as amended).
